events.name: default_TAR_SIZE
events.comment: default size of the raidus. Needs to be adjusted manually!

events.name: dynamic_MAXSPEED
events.comment: max speed for formulas where the max speed needs to be dynamic

events.name: turnMode
events.comment: defines the way that right clicking affects turn mode, possible options [lock+, lock-, plus, minus]

events.name: zoomIn
events.comment: enables or disables zoom in on enemy hit

actions.text: Set default values for this sheet
Setup mouse direction collision
Set up wall collider
Set up mouse direction
Set up Targeter
Set up Camera Point

children.name: regenTick
children.comment: timer that needs to be reached for regen to be triggered

children.name: immuTick
children.comment: how long the player is immune after being hit

actions.text: Regenerate HP
Mouse realted variables. Targeter angle -> Mouse angle, distance for dist check, diff -> difference in angle
Rotate towards mouse angle, set angle of motion
speed ratio on 0-1 based on the default Max speed
Limit speed to 0-currentMaxSpeed

children.title: Soft Max Speed Adjsutment
children.description: Make the acceleration slower after a certiant point

children.title: Acceleration Adjustmetn (Mouse Line)
children.description: Draws a line to the mouse to more easily visualise the movement and adjusts the acceleration based on the distance from the mouse to the player.

children.name: default_ACC_MAXAMIZER
children.comment: The distance of the mosue to reach "max" acceleration. Based on screen size(?)

children.name: accelerationMod
children.comment: Acceleration mod on the scale of 0-1

children.text: Adjust the acceleration speed of the player

actions.text: clamp on the range of 0-1

children.name: overlappingWallPlayer
children.comment: is true if the player is overlapping ANY kind of a wall

children.name: overlappingWallMouseDir
children.comment: is true if the player is overlapping ANY kind of a wall

actions.text: Cos Wall Based Debuggs
Slower dynamicMaxSpeed based
Is overlapping?

children.name: cosDiff
children.comment: calculation on the -1 to 1 comparing the mouseLine angle to the surface normal. -1 if it's facing the surface, +1 if it's opposite of it.

children.name: dynamicFriction
children.comment: friction based on the angle diff between the player direction and the wall that it hits

children.name: dynamicFrictionScale
children.comment: the high point of the dynamic friction scale. set on 1 will mean that the dynamic friction (pre clamp) will go from 0-1. putting it to 0.1 will make it go 0.9-1 etc.

children.name: dynamicFrictionHigh
children.comment: highest point on dynamic friction, putting this above 1 makes the player accelerate out of the wall

children.name: mouseOnWall
children.comment: is true if the mosuse direction is overlaping a wall

children.name: lerpOverlaping
children.comment: speed of the slowdown if you are overlaping with the wall

children.name: lerpNoOverlap
children.comment: speed of the slowdown if you are NOT overlaping with the wall

children.name: lowLimitOverlap
children.comment: perc based limit of current max speed

children.name: lowLimitNoOverlap
children.comment: perc based limit of current max speed

children.text: Slowdown when overlaping with a wall
I can't get the cosDiff based one to work so I am slowing down the max speed of the player over time as you are touching a wall

actions.text: disabled code for cos and friction is bonkers, don't worry about it being disabled
calculate the cos betweene the angles. returns -1 if the player is facing the wall, +1 if it's opposing the wall
calculates the friction and applies it to the player
lerp max speed to prevent wall slide boosting
Lerp towards the new minimum speed

children.name: tarSizeMod
children.comment: how much the targeter can shrink on a scale of 0-1. 0 = no shrink, 1 = targeter is 0x0
